full_summary:
### Tender for Supply, Delivery, and Installation of One (1) New Straw Labeler Printer System
#### Solicitation Number: WS3725205011
#### Publication Date: November 18, 2022
#### Tender Closing Date: December 8, 2022, 2:00 p.m. (EST)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the supply, delivery, and installation of one (1) new straw labeler printer system for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, located in Saskatoon, SK.

**Note:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 8, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. (EST). Bids submitted after this deadline will be considered non-responsive.

**Procurement Category:** Goods

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

The proposed straw labeler printer system will be used for the supply, delivery, and installation of one (1) new system that meets the requirements of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

**Key Details:**

* Supply, delivery, and installation of one (1) new straw labeler printer system
* Innovative, high-quality equipment design to ensure optimal performance and longevity
* Support for regional and low-maintenance requirements

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**

* Sallie Boutin, PSPC
* Email: [sallie.boutin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sallie.boutin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not specified
* Fax: Not specified

**Official Disclosure:**

Please visit the Ariba Discovery platform at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14517689 for further details on this tender opportunity.

#### Reference Number: WS3725205011-Doc3725461193
